thePirate:Retaliation.NAME: Retaliation
thePirate:Retaliation.DESCRIPTION: If enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to enemy intent.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to enemy intent (damage !D! X !M! ).
If enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to enemy intent (damage !D! ).
Retaliation deals damage equal to the intent above the target enemy, irrespective of buffs/debuffs the player currently has.

thePirate:GhostOfBlackbeard.NAME: Ghost of Blackbeard
thePirate:GhostOfBlackbeard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 [E] more for each card thepirate:Buried this combat.

thePirate:BoardingParty.NAME: Boarding Party
thePirate:BoardingParty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Bury all non-Attack cards in your draw pile.

thePirate:DeathKnell.NAME: Death Knell
thePirate:DeathKnell.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the start of combat and start of turn effects of target Relic. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Works with relics that do things at the beginning of combat (e.g., reset counters, apply buffs/defbuffs) and/or at the beginning of turn (e.g., dealing damage to enemies, incrementing counters).

thePirate:UnstableFormula.NAME: Unstable Formula
thePirate:UnstableFormula.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, Apply thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies equal to their current thepirate:Ink.

thePirate:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
thePirate:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury !M! cards. NL Gain temporary Strength equal to their cost, and !SM! Strength for each Unplayable card thepirate:Buried.

thePirate:GeneticSplice.NAME: Genetic Splice
thePirate:GeneticSplice.DESCRIPTION: Remove all thepirate:Ink from enemy. NL Gain 1 Dexterity for every !M! thepirate:Ink removed. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:ScoutAhead.NAME: Scout Ahead
thePirate:ScoutAhead.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, thepirate:Dig X times. NL Exhaust.
thePirate:ScoutAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, thepirate:Dig X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:PinDown.NAME: Pin Down
thePirate:PinDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Shuffle a *Shovel *Blade to your draw pile.

thePirate:ShovelBlade.NAME: Shovel Blade
thePirate:ShovelBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL thepirate:Dig twice. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:ChainShot.NAME: Chain Shot
thePirate:ChainShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:Sandblast.NAME: Sandblast
thePirate:Sandblast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Costs 1 [E] less for each card thepirate:Buried this turn.

thePirate:SeaTurtles.NAME: Sea Turtles
thePirate:SeaTurtles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you thepirate:Bury this, thepirate:Bury a copy. When you thepirate:Dig this, put a copy in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:Cyclone.NAME: Cyclone
thePirate:Cyclone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thepirate:Storm. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thepirate:Storm ( !STORM! ). NL Exhaust.

thePirate:Headbutt.NAME: Headbutt
thePirate:Headbutt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

thePirate:BolsterCrew.NAME: Bolster Crew
thePirate:BolsterCrew.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Mysterious. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL The first time you play this each combat, lose !SM! gold.

thePirate:ThiefsAccomplice.NAME: Thief's Accomplice
thePirate:ThiefsAccomplice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next time you lose gold this combat, gain that much gold.

thePirate:DarkOffering.NAME: Dark Offering
thePirate:DarkOffering.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury up to X cards and apply !M!X thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
thePirate:DarkOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury up to X+1 cards and apply !M! X+1 thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
thePirate:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, return the first non- Exhaust card you played the previous turn to your hand. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cannot return played powers to your hand. NL Does not stack.

thePirate:RedShirt.NAME: Red Shirt
thePirate:RedShirt.DESCRIPTION: When you would lose any HP this turn, receive that much thepirate:Bleeding instead. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:CephalopodForm.NAME: Cephalopod Form
thePirate:CephalopodForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a card, apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies.
thePirate:CephalopodForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies.

thePirate:HatchPlot.NAME: Hatch Plot
thePirate:HatchPlot.DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your discard pile (cannot choose Hatch Plot). NL Exhaust.
thePirate:HatchPlot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your discard pile (cannot choose Hatch Plot).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select a card to play from your discard pile

thePirate:PirateBay.NAME: Pirate Bay
thePirate:PirateBay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Create a copy of a card in your draw pile, then thepirate:Bury it. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:DarkPlans.NAME: Dark Plans
thePirate:DarkPlans.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. thepirate:Mysterious. NL Apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies for each time this was thepirate:Buried
thePirate:DarkPlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Mysterious. NL Apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies for each time this was thepirate:Buried

thePirate:AttendToCache.NAME: Attend to Cache
thePirate:AttendToCache.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury a card, then thepirate:Dig. NL Exhaust.
thePirate:AttendToCache.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury a card, then thepirate:Dig !M! times. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:AncientCrab.NAME: Ancient Crab
thePirate:AncientCrab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When thepirate:Buried, return this to your hand and then thepirate:Dig. NL thepirate:Predatory.

thePirate:Kraken.NAME: Kraken
thePirate:Kraken.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Stun enemy. NL Apply !M! thepirate:Ink to all OTHER enemies. NL thepirate:Predatory. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:ElectricEel.NAME: Electric Eel
thePirate:ElectricEel.DESCRIPTION: Draw !SM! card and NL gain [E]. NL When you thepirate:Bury this, play it. NL thepirate:Predatory.
thePirate:ElectricEel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !SM! card and NL gain [E] [E]. NL When you thepirate:Bury this, play it. NL thepirate:Predatory.

thePirate:LowerDefenses.NAME: Lower Defenses
thePirate:LowerDefenses.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Lure. NL Innate. Unplayable. NL On draw, gain !M! Frail, discard this, and draw a card.

thePirate:WithdrawWeapons.NAME: Withdraw Weapons
thePirate:WithdrawWeapons.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Lure. NL Innate. Unplayable. NL On draw, gain !M! Weak, discard this, and draw a card.

thePirate:BatheInBlood.NAME: Bathe in Blood
thePirate:BatheInBlood.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Lure. NL Innate. Unplayable. NL On draw, gain !M! Vulnerable, discard this, and draw a card.

thePirate:AncientMap.NAME: Ancient Map
thePirate:AncientMap.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you thepirate:Bury this card, draw !M! cards.

thePirate:AncientJewel.NAME: Ancient Jewel
thePirate:AncientJewel.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you thepirate:Bury this card, gain !M! [E].

thePirate:Austerity.NAME: Austerity
thePirate:Austerity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thepirate:Bury 1 or more cards, draw !M! card.

thePirate:HardenedBrine.NAME: Hardened Brine
thePirate:HardenedBrine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use energy, gain 1 Block for each energy spent.

thePirate:VolatileInk.NAME: Volatile Ink
thePirate:VolatileInk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies. NL Gain thepirate:Volatile_Ink.

thePirate:StormSurge.NAME: Storm Surge
thePirate:StormSurge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use energy, gain 1 temporary Strength for each energy spent.

thePirate:TooMuchRum.NAME: Too Much Rum
thePirate:TooMuchRum.DESCRIPTION: When you thepirate:Bury a card, Exhaust it and gain !M! Block.

thePirate:Subdue.NAME: Subdue
thePirate:Subdue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to thepirate:Ink on enemy.

thePirate:ChemicalWarfare.NAME: Chemical Warfare
thePirate:ChemicalWarfare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy takes 50% more damage from thepirate:Ink.

thePirate:FlexibleLimb.NAME: Flexible Limb
thePirate:FlexibleLimb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has thepirate:Ink, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

thePirate:BeachBuddy.NAME: Beach Buddy
thePirate:BeachBuddy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you thepirate:Bury, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

thePirate:AncientAlliances.NAME: Ancient Alliances
thePirate:AncientAlliances.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Mysterious. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! [E].

thePirate:DarkExperiment.NAME: Dark Experiment
thePirate:DarkExperiment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! thepirate:Ink.  If Fatal, permanently increase thepirate:Ink applied by this card by !SM! . NL Exhaust.

thePirate:DownWithTheShip.NAME: Down with the Ship
thePirate:DownWithTheShip.DESCRIPTION: Bury all but 1 card from your draw pile, then deal !D! damage for each card thepirate:Buried. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
thePirate:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The first time you play this each combat, Gain !M! thepirate:Corrupt_Artifact.

thePirate:StrangeBlade.NAME: Strange Blade
thePirate:StrangeBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Mysterious. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

thePirate:DavyJonesLocker.NAME: Davy Jones' Locker
thePirate:DavyJonesLocker.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Purge this and the next card you play.
thePirate:DavyJonesLocker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Purge this and the next card you play. NL Gain a Davy Jones' Locker to your deck.

thePirate:SorcererAttack.NAME: Sorcerer Attack
thePirate:SorcererAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all Artifact and Apply !M! thepirate:Corrupt_Artifact. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:CausticInk.NAME: Caustic Ink
thePirate:CausticInk.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses Block, thepirate:Artifacts, and 2 Strength. NL Apply thepirate:Ink equal to Block lost. NL Exhaust.
thePirate:CausticInk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Enemy loses Block, thepirate:Artifacts, and 2 Strength. NL Apply thepirate:Ink equal to Block lost. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:BeachCrew.NAME: Beach Crew
thePirate:BeachCrew.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may thepirate:Bury a card.

thePirate:FireAtWill.NAME: Fire At Will
thePirate:FireAtWill.DESCRIPTION: The next Cannonball you play, and The first Cannonball you play each turn costs 0.

thePirate:Saboteur.NAME: Saboteur
thePirate:Saboteur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next time enemy would gain Block, instead it doesn't.
thePirate:Saboteur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next time ALL enemies would gain Block, instead they don't.

thePirate:Ransom.NAME: Ransom
thePirate:Ransom.DESCRIPTION: thepirate:Bury a card.  Gain energy equal to its cost.

thePirate:Tropomyosin.NAME: Tropomyosin
thePirate:Tropomyosin.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and gains !SM! thepirate:Ink. NL Apply thepirate:Volatile_Ink to enemy for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:GrapeShot.NAME: Grape Shot
thePirate:GrapeShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL thepirate:Storm. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL thepirate:Storm ( !STORM! ). NL Exhaust.

thePirate:MomentousAttack.NAME: Momentous Attack
thePirate:MomentousAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each energy spent this turn.

thePirate:PirateForm.NAME: Pirate Form
thePirate:PirateForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, thepirate:Bury and then thepirate:Dig.
thePirate:PirateForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, thepirate:Bury and then thepirate:Dig.

thePirate:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
thePirate:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Permanently replace this card with a Retreat. NL thepirate:Purge.
thePirate:Overexert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Permanently replace this card with a [#76ec00]Retreat+[]. NL thepirate:Purge.

thePirate:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
thePirate:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Permanently replace this card with an Overexert. NL When you thepirate:Bury this, play it. NL thepirate:Purge.
thePirate:Retreat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Permanently replace this card with an [#76ec00]Overexert+[]. NL When you thepirate:Bury this, play it. NL thepirate:Purge.

thePirate:InkShot.NAME: Ink Shot
thePirate:InkShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:Mercenaries.NAME: Mercenaries
thePirate:Mercenaries.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage.  The first time you play this each combat, lose !M! gold.

thePirate:Menace.NAME: Menace
thePirate:Menace.DESCRIPTION: Double all debuffs on enemy. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:HeadToShore.NAME: Head to Shore
thePirate:HeadToShore.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card.  NL At the start of your next turn, thepirate:Dig.
thePirate:HeadToShore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and Discard a card.  NL At the start of your next turn, thepirate:Dig.

thePirate:ShotsInTheDark.NAME: Shots in the Dark
thePirate:ShotsInTheDark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.  NL If this kills an enemy, play this card again.

thePirate:HeatedShot.NAME: Heated Shot
thePirate:HeatedShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the leftmost enemy. NL If this kills an enemy, play this card again. NL Exhaust.

thePirate:CaptainsQuarters.NAME: Captain's Quarters
thePirate:CaptainsQuarters.DESCRIPTION: This Turn, your next Attack or Skill is played twice.  NL Exhaust.
thePirate:CaptainsQuarters.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This Turn, your next Attack or Skill is played twice.

thePirate:MakeshiftSpear.NAME: Makeshift Spear
thePirate:MakeshiftSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL When this card is Upgraded, remove it from your deck instead.
thePirate:MakeshiftSpear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Upgraded, immediately remove this card from your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Makeshift Spear cannot be targeted by random upgrades.

thePirate:SwabTheDeck.NAME: Swab The Deck
thePirate:SwabTheDeck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.  If this is the first card you played this turn gain !M! additional Block.

thePirate:Reload.NAME: Reload
thePirate:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a Cannon or a Cannonball from your Exhaust pile to your hand.
thePirate:Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Return a Cannon or a Cannonball from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

thePirate:GiantBeak.NAME: Giant Beak
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Giant Beak applies #yVulnerable before dealing damage.  Hover over enemy to see the calculated damage that will be applied after #yVulnerable.

thePirate:Cutlass.NAME: Cutlass
thePirate:Cutlass.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  NL Put this card on top of your draw pile and reduce it's damage by !M!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

thePirate:Cannon.NAME: Cannon
thePirate:Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL While this is in your hand, Retain 1 Cannonball this turn.
